name: Stovetop Mac and Cheese
author: Stephanie Melchione
description: This Creamy Stovetop Mac and Cheese is the BEST 30-minute meal for a busy week. Your family will love it every time!

name: Creole Mushroom Rice
author: Sanjeev Kapoor
description: Rice cooked with mushrooms and some other ingredients in the Creole style. This is a Sanjeev Kapoor exclusive recipe.

name: Almond Milk Smoothie
author: Sanjeev Kapoor
description: Enriched with almonds and garnished with sabza and blueberries, this smoothie is a power house of essential nutrients This recipe is from FoodFood TV channel

name: Spaghetti with Crispy Zucchini
author: LINDSAY
description: This Spaghetti with Crispy Zucchini is the perfect end-of-summer song! It doesnâ€™t get much better than fresh summer zucchini coated in a crispy, cheesy breading piled high on top of spaghetti with fresh herbs. YUM!

name: CHOCOLATE MUMMY COOKIES
author: KELLY
description: Get festive this Halloween with these delicious Chocolate Mummy Cookies!  Made healthier with zero butter, oil or refined sugar and are the perfect spooky treat your kids will love!
